siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Hosting a party? Let your guests choose the music in real-time with Pyro! Connect your Spotify Account, create a party, invite your guests with a link and you're ready to go. Collaborative listening has never been easier.
blogPost.body: Hosting a party? Let your guests choose the music in real-time with Pyro! Connect your Spotify Account, create a party, invite your guests with a link and you're ready to go. Collaborative listening has never been easier.
blogPost.title: Pyro - Spotify music voting for parties
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 举办派对？让你的客人实时选择音乐与Pyro! 连接您的 Spotify 帐户，创建一个派对，用链接邀请您的客人，然后您就可以开始了。协作聆听从未如此简单。
舉辦派對？讓你的客人實時選擇音樂與Pyro! 連接您的 Spotify 帳戶，創建一個派對，用鏈接邀請您的客人，然後您就可以開始了。協作聆聽從未如此簡單。

previous.excerpt: Recur comes packed with features, iOS-specific styling to make Recur fit right into your home-screen making subscription tracking simple and fast.
previous.title: Recur - Keep track of your subscriptions

localize.description: Recur的功能丰富，iOS特有的风格让Recur正好适合你的主屏幕，让订阅跟踪变得简单快捷。
Recur的功能豐富，iOS特有的風格讓Recur正好適合你的主屏幕，讓訂閱跟蹤變得簡單快捷。

next.excerpt: A small tool for exporting competitor social media analytics into csv and xlsx. The tool is mostly free, but we have a premium version for $9/month Facebook pages and hashtag/location data is available soon.
next.title: Export Competitor Social Media Data - Social media data into CSV and XLSX

localize.description: 一个小工具，用于将竞争对手的社交媒体分析数据导出为csv和xlsx。该工具主要是免费的，但我们有一个9美元/月的高级版本，Facebook页面和hashtag/位置数据很快就可以使用。
localize.tagline: 将社交媒体数据转化为CSV和XLSX格式。

localize.description: 一個小工具，用於將競爭對手的社交媒體分析數據導出爲csv和xlsx。該工具主要是免費的，但我們有一個9美元/月的高級版本，Facebook頁面和hashtag/位置數據很快就可以使用。
localize.tagline: 將社交媒體數據轉化爲CSV和XLSX格式。
